languages.text: {n}В глазах Хейнрикса появляется тепло и затаенная печаль.{/n} "Да. Мы будем вместе. Столько, сколько нам будет дозволено долгом".
{n}Warmth and lingering sadness appear in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Yes. We will be together, for as long as our duty will let us."
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах Хейнрикса появляется тепло и затаенная печаль.{/n} "Да. Мы будем вместе. Столько, сколько нам будет дозволено долгом".

traits.locale_text: {n}A warmth and lingering sadness appear in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Yes. We will be together, for as long as our duty will let us."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希的目光中充满了温暖，以及挥之不去的哀伤。{/n}“是啊，只要在职责允许的范围内，我会始终与你在一起。”
languages.original_text: {n}Warmth and lingering sadness appear in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Yes. We will be together, for as long as our duty will let us."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的目光中充满了温暖，以及挥之不去的哀伤。{/n}“是啊，只要在职责允许的范围内，我会始终与你在一起。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}En los ojos de Heinrix afloran calidez y una tristeza persistente.{/n} «Sí. Estaremos juntos mientras nuestros deberes nos lo permitan».
languages.original_text: {n}Warmth and lingering sadness appear in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Yes. We will be together, for as long as our duty will let us."

traits.locale_text: {n}En los ojos de Heinrix afloran calidez y una tristeza persistente.{/n} «Sí. Estaremos juntos mientras nuestros deberes nos lo permitan».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの目には、ぬくもりと一縷の悲しみが浮かび上がる。{/n}「ああ、任務が続く限り、共にいよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Warmth and lingering sadness appear in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Yes. We will be together, for as long as our duty will let us."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの目には、ぬくもりと一縷の悲しみが浮かび上がる。{/n}「ああ、任務が続く限り、共にいよう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Wärme und nachhaltige Trauer erscheinen in Heinrix' Augen.{/n} "Ja. Wir werden zusammen sein, so lange unsere Pflicht uns das gestattet."
languages.original_text: {n}Warmth and lingering sadness appear in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Yes. We will be together, for as long as our duty will let us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Wärme und nachhaltige Trauer erscheinen in Heinrix' Augen.{/n} "Ja. Wir werden zusammen sein, so lange unsere Pflicht uns das gestattet."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une tristesse persistante apparaît dans le regard chaleureux d'Heinrix.{/n} « Oui. Nous resterons ensemble aussi longtemps que notre devoir nous le permettra. »
languages.original_text: {n}Warmth and lingering sadness appear in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Yes. We will be together, for as long as our duty will let us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une tristesse persistante apparaît dans le regard chaleureux d'Heinrix.{/n} « Oui. Nous resterons ensemble aussi longtemps que notre devoir nous le permettra. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in gözlerine sıcaklık ve kalıcı bir hüzün hâkim.{/n} "Evet. Birlikte olacağız. Vazifelerimiz müsaade ettiği sürece."
languages.original_text: {n}Warmth and lingering sadness appear in Heinrix's eyes.{/n} "Yes. We will be together, for as long as our duty will let us."
